title: Pixel 3XL: Sometimes, when I charge my phone, the charging is on and off in a loop
content:
Sometimes, when I charge my phone the charging is on and off in a loop. You can see the screen on and off and hear the plugging sound again and again.
When I plug the type c to type c cable to my laptop, the issue is gone.
When I use another charger (samsung charger) it does not happen.
I must admit that the issue occurs sometimes and not all the time.
Sometimes I restart my phone and it still occurs and sometimes it does solve the issue.
It happened about 6-7 times and I have this lovely phone from January 2019.

What should I do?

Thanks
Tal K
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
